title: Bug 38131ajc needs -d . option while correctly compiling classes from subpackage
OB: The compiled file, test.class, is placed in the wrong location, resulting in the 'java.lang.NoClassDefFoundError' error when trying to run the program.
EB: The compiled file should be placed in the correct location, allowing the program to run without errors.
SR: To reproduce the issue, run the command 'ajc -d . subpackage\Test.java'.
